items.title: A missing protein may be aging your immune system
bullets: • A protein called platelet factor 4 naturally declines over time, allowing blood stem cells to multiply too freely and drift toward unhealthy, mutation-prone behavior linked to cancer, inflammation, and heart disease
• Researchers found that restoring this protein in older mice and even in human stem cells in the lab made aging blood and immune cells behave strikingly younger again

bullets: • Anita Froese, a Mennonite, never immunized her children against measles
• Instead, she administered cod liver oil, vitamins, tea and broth

items.title: Texas appeals court says AG Ken Paxton can’t require counties to hand over case data
bullets: • Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton does not have the authority to enforce a new rule that would compel district attorneys in the state’s most populous areas to share prosecutorial data with the attorney general
• A Travis County district judge had previously temporarily blocked rules that gave Paxton meticulous access to the office records of urban district attorneys
• The seven district attorneys suing Paxton said the rule is an unconstitutional overreach that would needlessly burden offices that would have to present ‘terabytes of data’ to Paxton

• It is lower than our pre-release prediction of $97 million, and also our Friday-morning $95-million prediction
• A good day on Sunday could see it hit $90 million still

items.title: Weekend predictions: Avatar fires up theaters with weekend headed to the 90s or 100s
bullets: • Weekend predictions: Avatar fires up theaters with weekend headed to the 90s or 100s
• The movie is a lock on top spot at the box office through the Holidays
• The seasonal timing and lack of FOMO means many people aren’t in a huge hurry to see the movie on opening weekend

items.title: Theater counts: Avatar: Fire and Ash ignites the big screen, launching in 3,800 theaters
bullets: • Zootopia 2 reclaimed the top spot at the weekend box office
• The film surpassed Five Nights at Freddy's 2 by $6 million and surpassing $250 million domestically
• The long-awaited Avatar: Fire and Ash opens in 3,800 theaters this weekend

items.title: Weekend projections: Zootopia returns to the top of the chart as Ella McCay disappoints
bullets: • Zootopia returns to top of the chart as Five Nights at Freddy’s 2 takes a steep drop from its opening weekend
• Ella McCay's $2.1 million on debut is a disappointment, and only enough for seventh place on the chart

items.title: Weekend predictions: Zootopia likely winner in last weekend before the Holiday rush
bullets: • Zootopia 2 is the clear favorite to come top at the box office this weekend
• Five Nights at Freddy’s 2 likely to take a steep fall from its $64-million opening last weekend
• Wicked: For Good should land third, with Ella McCay (the only new release playing in over 2,000 theaters) and How the Grinch Stole Christmas looking likely to battle for fourth and fifth places
